item.title: UNDER CONSTRUCTION
item.description: This site is under construction… more to come soon!

item.title: 2017 Guide
item.description: This guide for Uncommon Hacks 2017 was originally posted on GitHub We cannot wait for you to attend Uncommon Hacks January 14-15 at the Polsky Exchange in Chicago, Illinois. We hope you make friends, learn, meme out, but most importantly, have fun ᖍ(ツ)ᖌ. Before the Hackathon What to Bring Here are some common choices of things to bring to a hackathon. Computer Or any other hardware you are interested in using Chargers Phone Charger Computer Charger Spare clothes Changing clothes is an awesome feeling if you’re into it We also recommend bringing a hoodie incase it gets cold Blanket / sleeping bag We will be providing sleeping mattresses, but it might get cold, especially since it’s January :(.
